name: Tunvienor's Nectar
description: A cure made from the stalk of Fricai Andlat
comments: Arya: This wonderful stuff saved from a deadly poison
Angela the Herbalist: I love finding this stuff: it always heals my patients.

name: Gorgon's Tears
description: Although extremely difficult to obtain, this is a wondermaker on petrified people.
comments: Prince Charming: This saved my best buddy after he was petrified, with no side effects.

name: Midnight Tea
description: Used most frequently as a beverage by the night-watch to help keep them awake longer.
comments: A Night Watch Guard: This stuff is SO helpful, I can't belive anyone could go without this stuff.
??? - DON'T DRINK THIS STUFF!!! YOU WILL NEVER BE ABLE TO GET A GOOD SLEEP FOR WEEKS!!!
